list.name: Default
list.comment:
Started sync work. NOTE: BROKEN BUILD.
(I realize it's not proper to make a commit where the app is broken, but I need to push my changes to save them for the night.)
This is mostly the sync.coffee file ported to Java. But there are parts I don't quite understand yet, so I left those parts in Coffeescript as markers.
I also left some comments at the bottom of SyncHelper_v2 about what I believe still needs to be done. A talk with George will hopefully clear it up.

task.summary:
Switching over to IntelliJ.
Also going to try to switch to Expandablelistview. ListView has been giving me a ton of issues.
Also, using IntelliJ's built-in git support as opposed to the cli like normal. Also on Windows. So this commit might be effed up.
Added custom background support. Was surprisingly easy!
Am going to try to get a market-ready version.
Fixed the date dialog size & location

Forgot about committing again.
More steps toward Version2. UI is just about done-ish, minus tweaks that the other guys want done.
Now, the hard part: sync.
Fixed an issue with it not showing the correct views on group expand/collapse.
Added ability for checkmarks to toggle the priority indicator

Actually made it where if you check an item it gets checked in the dbase.
I swear to god, if I actually missed this and it didn't accidentally get taken out in the changeover....

Fixed sorting with finished tasks
Now they are always on the bottom: if you sort or if you don't.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
Fixed sorting with finished tasks
Now they are always on the bottom: if you sort or if you don't.

Switching over to IntelliJ.
Also going to try to switch to Expandablelistview. ListView has been giving me a ton of issues.

Also going to try to switch to Expandablelistview. ListView has been giving me a ton of issues.
Also, using IntelliJ's built-in git support as opposed to the cli like normal. Also on Windows. So this commit might be effed up.

Am going to try to get a market-ready version.

Forgot about committing again.
More steps toward Version2. UI is just about done-ish, minus tweaks that the other guys want done.
Now, the hard part: sync.
Fixed an issue with it not showing the correct views on group expand/collapse.
Added ability for checkmarks to toggle the priority indicator

Actually made it where if you check an item it gets checked in the dbase.
I swear to god, if I actually missed this and it didn't accidentally get taken out in the changeover....

Fixed sorting with finished tasks
Now they are always on the bottom: if you sort or if you don't.
